mapper.select: SELECT rd.coinid, rd.amount, rd.evaluate guestappraisal, sacbi.evaluate, rd.score, rd.remark, rd.numindex, rd.totalreqcost, rd.totalevaluate, rd.amountofissue, rd.guestappraisal, rd.wmk, rd.whetherSample, rd.blockNum, rd.guestWRSize as size, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.shortsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, sacbi.grade, rd.guestWRGrade as gradename, (SELECT money FROM sys_box_basic_info box WHERE boxid=box.id) as boxCost, sacbi.dynasty, (SELECT dicvalue FROM sys_dictionary_basic_data_info WHERE dickey = sacbi.dynasty AND dictype = "CHINESE_DYNASTY") dynastyname, material, (SELECT ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) FROM sys_coin_material m WHERE m.id = material) caizhi, ExtractValue(st.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") guojia, rd.version FROM request_detail rd, sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi, sys_country st WHERE rd.coinid = sacbi.id AND sacbi.country = st.id AND rd.requestid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rd.numindex

SELECT r.entitytype,r.requestcode,sdbdi.dicvalue as coincountry,rc.coincode,rc.tagindex,rc.remark,rc.ratingreasondis, rd.evaluate,rd.numindex,r.usercode,r.customer,r.mobile, r.mail,r.serviceid,r.speed,r.totalamount,r.totalweight,r.totalpreferential,r.othercost, r.totalevaluate,r.totalreqcost,r.totalpremium,r.totaltransportation, r.totalinsurance,r.totalcost,r.sendtype,r.payment, rc.score, ExtractValue(co.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as country, ExtractValue(p.name, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as province, ExtractValue(c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as city, ExtractValue(d.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") as area, r.address,r.paystatus,rd.guestappraisal,rd.totalreqcost as totalcoincost, rd.coinid,num.gpn as sameCoinNum FROM (SELECT rc1.coincode,rc1.coinid as cid,count(*) as gpn FROM request_coin rc1 LEFT JOIN request_detail rd1 ON rc1.requestid = rd1.requestid AND rc1.coinid = rd1.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r1 ON rc1.requestid = r1.id WHERE r1.requestcode =#{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by rc1.coinid) num,request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rc.requestid = rd.requestid AND rc.coinid = rd.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON rc.requestid = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_country co ON r.country = co.id LEFT JOIN sys_province p ON r.province = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_city c ON r.city = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_district d ON r.area = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi ON rc.coinid = sacbi.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi ON sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty WHERE r.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND num.cid=rd.coinid AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' ORDER BY coincode ASC

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sc.shortname as guojia,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis,sdbdi.dicvalue as dynasty,scm.shortname as caizhi, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang,rd.guestWRSize as size,rd.version,rc.remark as coinremark,rd.guestWRGrade as grade, rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi left join sys_coin_material scm on scm.id=sacbi.material, sys_country sc,sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sacbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' AND rc.id=#{requestcoinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sc.shortname as guojia,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis,sdbdi.dicvalue as dynasty,scm.shortname as caizhi, rc.weight as zhongliang,rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion as version,rc.remark as coinremark,rc.guestWRGrade as grade, (CASE WHEN r.serviceid = 1 THEN '新评' WHEN r.serviceid = 2 THEN '重评' WHEN r.serviceid = 5 THEN '真品鉴定' END ) serviceid,rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi left join sys_coin_material scm on scm.id=sacbi.material, sys_country sc,sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sacbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' AND rc.coincode=#{coincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT ( SELECT dicvalue FROM sys_dictionary_basic_data_info dic WHERE dic.dictype = "CHINESE_DYNASTY" AND dic.dickey = c.dynasty ) dynastyname, c.dynasty, rc.guestWRGrade gradename, c.catalogue, c.shortsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, ( CASE WHEN rc.weight IS NOT NULL AND rc.weight != '' THEN rc.weight WHEN rd.guestWRWeight IS NOT NULL AND rd.guestWRWeight != '' THEN rd.guestWRWeight WHEN c.weight IS NOT NULL AND c.weight != '' THEN c.weight END ) weight, rc.customsize size, ( CASE c.country WHEN c.country = '1' THEN ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) ELSE ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='en_US']" ) END ) AS country, ( SELECT ExtractValue ( m.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) FROM sys_coin_material m WHERE m.id = c.material ) material, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis FROM sys_ancient_coin_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc, request_detail rd WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND rc.requestdetailid = rd.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sdbdi.dicvalue as dynasty,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis, rc.guestWRGrade as grade,scm.shortname as caizhi, rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion,rc.score, rc.remark as pubremark,rc.ratingreasondis from request_detail rd LEFT JOIN request_coin rc ON rc.requestdetailid=rd.id LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id=rd.requestid LEFT JOIN sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi on sacbi.id=rd.coinid LEFT JOIN sys_coin_material scm ON scm.id=sacbi.material LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi on sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty where rd.requestid=#{requestid} AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sdbdi.dicvalue as dynasty,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis, rc.guestWRGrade as grade,scm.shortname as caizhi,rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi left join sys_coin_material scm on sacbi.material=scm.id, sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi,request_detail rd where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' AND rc.requestid=#{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode,rcs.level,rcs.scoreby

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sdbdi.dicvalue as dynasty,sc.shortname as guojia,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis, rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion,rd.guestWRGrade as grade,scm.shortname as caizhi, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs ON rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id AND rcs.scoreby=#{scoreby} AND rcs.`level`='1' LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rd.id=rc.requestdetailid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id=rc.requestid LEFT JOIN sys_ancient_coin_basic_info sacbi ON sacbi.id=rc.coinid LEFT JOIN sys_country sc ON sc.id=sacbi.country LEFT JOIN sys_coin_material scm ON scm.id=sacbi.material LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary_basic_data_info sdbdi ON sdbdi.dickey=sacbi.dynasty WHERE rc.requestid=#{requestid} AND sdbdi.dictype='CHINESE_DYNASTY' ORDER BY rc.coincode
